item.title: 战争持续，以色列通胀率飙升超过预期
item.description: 由于加沙战争给经济造成压力，政府支出激增，以色列上个月的通货膨胀率同比加速上升至 3.6%，超过预期。【原文：Israel’s inflation accelerated more than expected last month, to 3.6% year on year, as the war in Gaza strains the economy and the government’s spending soars.】

item.title: Saipem 获得价值约 40 亿美元的卡塔尔近海合同
item.description: Saipem SpA 获得了卡塔尔能源液化天然气公司（QatarEnergyLNG）价值约 40 亿美元的海上工程、采购和施工合同。【原文：Saipem SpA was awarded an offshore Engineering, Procurement and Construction contract by QatarEnergyLNG worth about $4 billion.】

item.title: Stellantis 反对欧盟推迟实施汽车排放法规
item.description: 欧洲第二大汽车制造商 Stellantis NV 正在对欧盟推迟明年生效的排放目标的任何举动进行反击，从而可能与该地区的其他制造商发生冲突。【原文：Stellantis NV, Europe’s second-biggest carmaker, is pushing back against any move by the European Union to delay emissions targets set to take effect next year, setting up a potential clash with other manufacturers in the region.】

item.title: 加里-科恩称美联储降息已被计入抵押贷款市场
item.description: 曾担任美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）首席经济顾问的加里-科恩（Gary Cohn）认为，美联储本周的降息预期不会给面临高借贷成本的购房者带来多少宽慰。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s expected rate cuts this week won’t provide much relief to homebuyers facing high borrowing costs, according to Gary Cohn, who served as chief economic adviser to former President Donald Trump.】

item.title: H.I.G. 据称将向德国房地产开发商 Ziegert 投资 5000 万欧元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，H.I.G. Capital 将向总部位于柏林的房地产开发商 Ziegert 注资 5000 万欧元（5500 万美元），这是自建筑成本急剧上升和需求下降导致房地产行业不景气以来的首批此类交易之一。【原文：H.I.G. Capital is injecting €50 million ($55 million) into Berlin-based property developer Ziegert, according to people familiar with the matter, one of the first such deals in the sector since a slump caused by a sharp rise in construction costs and drop in demand.】

item.title: 美国铝业公司将获得 11 亿美元的沙特铝厂股份
item.description: 美国铝业公司（Alcoa Corp. ）将获得 11 亿美元现金和沙特阿拉伯矿业公司（Saudi Arabian Mining Co.【原文：Alcoa Corp. will receive $1.1 billion in cash and stock in Saudi Arabian Mining Co. as part of a deal that will involve the Pittsburgh-based firm selling its stake in two metals plants in northern Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: Astra 的大片药物在膀胱癌治疗中大获全胜
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的Imfinzi延长了膀胱癌患者的生命，可能为这种大片药物开辟了一个新市场。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc’s Imfinzi extended the lives of patients with bladder cancer, potentially opening up a new market for the blockbuster medicine.】

item.title: 默克最畅销药物巩固难治乳腺癌治疗地位
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co.【原文：Merck & Co.’s best-selling drug Keytruda helped women with a hard-to-treat form of breast cancer live longer, according to the first study to show such a benefit in these patients.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国家能源公司开始从丹格特运输汽油
item.description: 尼日利亚国有能源公司开始从丹格特炼油厂运送汽油，这一举措将结束非洲最大原油生产国几十年来对进口燃料的依赖。【原文：Nigeria’s state-owned energy firm began shipping gasoline from the Dangote Refinery, a step that could end decades of dependence on imports of the fuel for Africa’s largest crude producer.】

item.title: JD Vance 称特朗普关税将有助于为减税计划买单
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普的竞选伙伴、俄亥俄州参议员 JD Vance 表示，如果他在 11 月再次当选，他对美国进口商品征收更高关税的议程将有助于抵消他不断扩大的减税提议。【原文：Former President Donald Trump’s agenda of higher tariffs on US imports would help offset his expanding tax-cut proposals if he’s reelected in November, according to his running mate, Ohio Senator JD Vance.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长 Wunsch 称利率应下降，但对通胀发出警告
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员皮埃尔-温施（Pierre Wunsch）认为，欧洲中央银行应该能够继续放宽政策，但必须注意消费价格的增长。【原文：The European Central Bank should be able to continue to ease policy, but must be mindful of consumer-price growth, according to Governing Council member Pierre Wunsch.】

item.title: 随着 "其他 493 "的追赶，S&P 500 指数在大型科技公司的下滑中幸存下来
item.description: 股市已经收复了夏季大跌的大部分损失。虽然 S&P 500 指数以前也曾反弹过，但这次很特别，因为它不是由大科技公司引领的，而是轮到了其他人。【原文：The stock market has recovered most of the losses suffered in its summer selloff. While the S&P 500 Index has bounced back before, this time is unique because it isn’t being led by Big Tech — instead it’s everyone else’s turn.】

item.title: 苹果新款助听器和健康升级拯救了 iPhone 16 发布会
item.description: 苹果公司新推出的 AirPods 助听器功能和其他健康功能弥补了 iPhone 16 发布会的沉闷。此外：公司正在为 M4 Mac 活动做准备；iPhone 16 一开始将缺少一些关键功能；新款 Apple Watch SE 仍在开发中。【原文：Apple’s new AirPods hearing-aid feature and other health capabilities made up for an otherwise dull iPhone 16 launch. Also: The company gears up for an M4 Mac event; the iPhone 16 will lack some key features at the outset; and a new Apple Watch SE remains in development.】

item.title: 降息周期启动，资金涌入东南亚
item.description: 全球基金正在抢购东南亚资产，因为降息的前景和诱人的估值有望带来超额回报。【原文：Global funds are snapping up Southeast Asian assets as the prospect of interest-rate cuts and attractive valuations holds out the promise of supersized returns.】

item.title: 纳格尔表示，德国需要付出更多努力才能摆脱困境
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，要使德国经济摆脱目前的困境，还需要付出更多努力。【原文：More effort is required to get Germany’s economy out of its current rut, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 泰晤士报》：泰晤士河水务公司（Thames Water）邀请布鲁克菲尔德公司（Brookfield）和 GIP 筹款：时代
item.description: 据《泰晤士报》报道，泰晤士河水务公司已与北美基础设施巨头布鲁克菲尔德基础设施合伙公司（Brookfield Infrastructure Partners）、全球基础设施合伙公司（Global Infrastructure Partners）以及斯顿皮克公司（Stonepeak）接洽，希望它们参与33亿英镑（43亿美元）的紧急筹资，以拯救这家英国最大的供水和污水处理供应商。【原文：Thames Water has approached North American infrastructure giants Brookfield Infrastructure Partners, Global Infrastructure Partners as well as Stonepeak to participate in a £3.3 billion ($4.3 billion) emergency fundraising to rescue the UK’s largest water and sewage provider, The Times reported.】

item.title: NZZ 称瑞银面临瑞士业界日益高涨的不满情绪
item.description: 据《新苏黎世报》（Neue Zürcher Zeitung am Sonntag）公布的一项调查详情显示，自瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse）被收购以来，近四分之一的瑞士制造业和工业企业遇到了瑞银集团贷款条件恶化或服务质量下降的问题。【原文：Almost a quarter of Swiss manufacturing and industrial companies have experienced worsening terms on loans or deteriorating service from UBS Group AG since the takeover of Credit Suisse, according to details of a survey published by the Neue Zürcher Zeitung am Sonntag.】

item.title: 据说软银支持的 Swiggy 将于本周在印度提交首次公开募股申请
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，印度食品配送平台 Swiggy Ltd. 正在考虑最快于本周公开申请在国内进行首次公开募股，这将为该公司在国内的股票销售渠道增添强劲动力。【原文：Indian food-delivery platform Swiggy Ltd. is considering filing publicly for its domestic initial public offering as soon as this week, people familiar with the matter said, adding to a strong pipeline of share sales in the country.】

item.title: 中国股票交易员思考经济会变得多么糟糕
item.description: 中国一连串糟糕的经济数据加深了股票交易者的悲观情绪，他们不知道中国政府需要采取什么措施才能启动强有力的刺激政策。【原文：A slew of poor economic data from China is deepening pessimism among equities traders wondering what it’d take for authorities to initiate forceful stimulus.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司与飞行员工会达成协议，避免罢工
item.description: 加拿大航空公司在最后一刻与飞行员工会达成了协议，避免了可能导致全球每天 1,000 多个航班停飞的罢工。【原文：Air Canada reached a last-minute pact with the pilots’ union, averting a strike that would have grounded more than 1,000 daily flights worldwide.】

item.title: 淡马锡据说接近收购黑石集团旗下 VFS 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）即将达成收购 VFS Global 少数股权的交易，包括债务在内，这笔交易对这家签证外包和技术服务公司的估值约为 70 亿美元。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte is nearing a deal to buy a significant minority stake in VFS Global, according to people familiar with the matter, a transaction that could value the visa outsourcing and technology services firm at about $7 billion including debt.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 "潮一代 "退休时所需资金不到一半
item.description: 根据行业最高机构的研究，大约三分之二即将离开劳动力市场的澳大利亚婴儿潮一代没有足够的养老金储蓄来安享晚年。【原文：About two thirds of Australian baby boomers leaving the workforce don’t have enough pension savings to retire comfortably, according to research from the industry’s peak body.】

item.title: 淡水河谷在检查发现表面裂缝后进行大坝检查
item.description: 淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）称，在一次例行检查中发现巴西东南部的一座大坝表面出现裂缝，因此正在对该大坝进行额外检查，但到目前为止，该大坝的结构仍处于稳定状态。【原文：Vale SA said it was conducting additional checks on a dam in southeast Brazil after a routine inspection identified surface cracks, but so far has found the structure to be in stable condition.】

item.title: 墨西哥将更加重视海外可持续债券
item.description: 墨西哥财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）告诉《拉丁金融》，墨西哥将转向在海外销售更多的可持续债券。这些债券为环境或社会项目提供资金。【原文：Mexico will shift toward selling more sustainable bonds overseas, Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio told LatinFinance. The bonds finance environmental or social projects.】

item.title: 全球为美联储宽松政策做好准备--36 小时利率过山车
item.description: 本周，当美国开始宽松周期时，世界经济的板块将发生变化，而从欧洲到亚洲的官员们也将在市场脆弱的背景下制定政策。【原文：The world economy’s tectonic plates will shift this week when a US easing cycle begins, just as officials from Europe to Asia set policy against a backdrop of brittle markets.】

item.title: 秘鲁将于今年接管 Petroperu 公司剩余债务的偿还工作
item.description: 秘鲁政府周六宣布了一项针对陷入困境的国有企业秘鲁石油公司（Petroleos del Peru SA）的一揽子援助计划，要求该公司偿还国际债券持有人的债务，同时免除部分贷款并提高其信贷额度。【原文：The Peruvian government announced an aid package for ailing state-owned company Petroleos del Peru SA on Saturday, putting the state on the hook for repaying international bondholders, while forgiving some loans and increasing its credit line.】

item.title: 俄罗斯与伊朗共享核机密引发美英担忧
item.description: 美国和英国越来越担心，俄罗斯正在与伊朗分享秘密信息和技术，这可能会使伊朗更接近于能够制造核武器，作为交换，德黑兰向莫斯科提供弹道导弹，用于乌克兰战争。【原文：The US and UK are increasingly concerned that Russia is sharing with Iran secret information and technology that could bring it closer to being able to build nuclear weapons, in exchange for Tehran providing Moscow with ballistic missiles for its war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》称，阿克塞尔-施普林格与 KKR 接近达成 135 亿欧元的分拆协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》报道，德国亿万富翁马蒂亚斯-多普弗纳（Mathias Döpfner）和 KKR 即将达成分拆媒体巨头阿克塞尔-施普林格（Axel Springer）的协议。【原文：German billionaire Mathias Döpfner and KKR are nearing a deal to split up the media giant Axel Springer, the Financial Times reports.】

item.title: 私人信贷繁荣的大赢家逐渐清晰
item.description: 在迅速扩张的私人信贷资产类别中，富人和穷人之间正在形成鸿沟。【原文：A chasm is forming between the haves and have-nots in the rapidly expanding private credit asset class.】
